Payments.a: We accept VISA, MasterCard, and Cash on Delivery (COD).

Payments.q: Is it safe to use my card?
Payments.a: Yes, all our payments are processed through a secure gateway.

Delivery.a: Deliveries within Colombo take 1-2 business days. Outstation deliveries take 2-4 business days.
A standard delivery fee of LKR 350 is charged for all orders.

ගෙවීම්.a: අප VISA, MasterCard, සහ Cash on Delivery (COD) භාරගනු ලැබේ.

භාණ්ඩ බෙදාහැරීම.a: කොළඹ ඇතුළත දින 1-2ක් සහ අනෙකුත් ප්‍රදේශ සඳහා දින 2-4ක් ගතවේ.
